name: Wand of Magic Missiles
description: This wand has 7 charges and regains 1d6+1 expended charges daily at dawn

effects.name: Magic Missile
effects.description: While holding it, you can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the magic missile spell. For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version. You can increase the spell slot by one for each additional charge.
